content: As far as modern writing is concerned, it is rarely rewarding to translate it, although it might be easy. Translation is very much like copying paintings.
translations: ita:Per quanto riguarda la scrittura moderna, Ã¨ raramente gratificante tradurla, anche se potrebbe essere facile. La traduzi
